name: Zombie Survival (ideadzombie)
description:
Made in gamemaker 8.1 for a school project. 

I made it fully in a few days with removing bugs for a few days after whilst I had friends play test it. 

There is an easter egg in the game however it is very basic but have fun finding it, that is also how you get to the end of the game.

This game is heavily inspired by COD zombies but is a 2D top down version

I know there are a few things that need to be worked on like UI and making the graphics look a little nicer but I think ill use this as a learning point. 

I also think I will make my next game in unity rather than gamemaker 8.1 as it's a little out dated. 

But other than that I'd love to know what you think.
